title: S-01: Direct Redundancy
instruction: Stand at the corner. Submit 3 separate 'Pothole' reports at the EXACT same location (don't move the pin).

title: S-02: Causal Chain
instruction: First, report a 'Pipe Leak'. Then, move the pin 10 meters downhill and report a 'Flood'.

title: S-03: Discrete Neighbors
instruction: Report 'No Water' at House A. Then report 'No Water' at House B (approx 15 meters away).

title: S-04: False Correlation
instruction: Report a 'Stray Dog'. Then, right next to it (1 meter away), report a 'Pothole'.

title: S-05: Domino Effect
instruction: Create a line: 1. Pipe Leak -> 2. Flood (10m away) -> 3. Traffic (another 10m away).

title: S-06: Precision Edge
instruction: Report Pothole A (Center). Report Pothole B roughly 25 meters away (use the scale reference).

title: S-07: Mass Panic
instruction: Simulate a panic. Rapidly click 5 times in a small cluster around this building.

title: S-08: GPS Drift
instruction: Aim for the streetlight, but click 5 times slightly off-center (scattered) to simulate bad GPS.

title: S-9: Data Conflict
instruction: Report 'Fire'. Then, without moving the pin, report 'Pothole' at the EXACT same spot.

title: S-11: Moving Hazard
instruction: Report 'Dog' here. Then scroll the map North (approx 60m) and report 'Dog' again.

title: S-12: Default Pin
instruction: Do not move the pin. Just hit submit immediately (simulates lazy user).
